sections.title: FRUIT STAND THEME
sections.content: A custom Shopify theme designed for an online fruit market, built with a strong focus on conversion rate optimization and modern Shopify development best practices.

sections.title: PRODUCT COMPARISON TOOL
sections.content: A comparison feature that lets customers evaluate fruits side-by-side based on price, ratings, and dietary info—empowering more confident purchasing decisions.

sections.title: COLLECTION FILTERING
sections.content: A modern collection page with a sleek design and dynamic filtering options, including a custom-built sliding price selector that integrates seamlessly with Horizon's default filtering system.

sections.title: FREE SHIPPING PROGRESS BAR
sections.content: A dynamic progress bar in the cart that visually shows customers how close they are to receiving free shipping—driving higher average order values and improving the checkout experience.

sections.title: ITALIAN BAKERY THEME
sections.content: An elegant Shopify 2.0 theme created for a mid-sized Italian bakery, focused on CRO and UX best practices. The launch drove a 115% increase in year-over-year online revenue.

sections.title: PRODUCT CATEGORIZATION & NAVIGATION
sections.content: Navigation and product categorization was redesigned using behavioral analytics and UX best practices, resulting in a more intuitive and user-friendly shopping journey.

sections.title: THIRD-PARTY APP INTEGRATION
sections.content: A third-party app for in-store pickup and local delivery time slots was integrated into the cart, with its appearance and functionality customized to blend seamlessly with the theme’s design.
